email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $49.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The rate is more acceptable, but could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for these dates? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and the MV Ocean Star is available for the revised laycan of 18-23 October. Let me know if we can proceed with the freight rate of $49.50 and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Looking forward to your confirmation. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We’re good to proceed with the terms discussed: freight at $49.50 and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Please send over the charter party for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah
